/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a faint halo of clouds adding a touch of whimsy to the otherwise ordinary day. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. On the left side of the street, a row of buildings stands tall, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image paints a picture of a peaceful day in a bustling city, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
